name: folder-party
description: a simple static site generator that creates a website from a folder of files on your computer so you can invite your friends to hang out on your file system

scripts.test: npm run build && OVERWRITE=true FOLDER=generator/test/testdata node generator/dist/generate.js
scripts.theme.dev: PORT=2350 FOLDER=public/theme-builder npx nodemon --watch public/theme-builder --ext js,html,css dev-server.js

author: lizz thabet
